00032 /* \file     egs_fortran_geometry.cpp
00033  *  \brief    A Fortran interface for using egspp geometries (implementation).
00034 */
00035 
00036 #include "egs_fortran_geometry.h"
00037 #include "egs_base_geometry.h"
00038 #include "egs_simple_container.h"
00039 #include "egs_input.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 
00042 #include <cctype>
00043 #include <cstring>
00044 using namespace std;
00045 
00046 static EGS_SimpleContainer<EGS_BaseGeometry*> egspp_f_geoms;
00047 
00048 const static char *egspp_f_error_message = "%s: Invalid geometry index %d\n";
00049 
00050 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_init_geometry,EGSPP_INIT_GEOMETRY)(
00051         EGS_I32 *igeom, const char *file_name, int flength) {
00052     int n = flength-1;
00053     while( isspace(file_name[n]) && n > 0 ) --n;
00054     char *fname = new char [n+1];
00055     for(int j=0; j<n; ++j) fname[j] = file_name[j];
00056     fname[n] = '\0';
00057     EGS_Input input; input.setContentFromFile(fname);
00058     delete [] fname;
00059     EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(&input);
00060     if( g ) {
00061         *igeom = egspp_f_geoms.size();
00062         g->ref(); egspp_f_geoms.add(g);
00063     }
00064     else {
00065         egsWarning("egspp_init_geometry: failed to create a geometry from "
00066                 "the input in file %s\n",fname);
00067         *igeom = -1;
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_howfar,EGSPP_HOWFAR)(
00072         const EGS_I32 *igeom, const EGS_I32 *ireg,
00073         const EGS_Float *x, const EGS_Float *y, const EGS_Float *z,
00074         const EGS_Float *u, const EGS_Float *v, const EGS_Float *w,
00075         EGS_I32 *inew, EGS_I32 *newmed, EGS_Float *ustep) {
00076     int ig = *igeom;
00077     if( ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size() )
00078         egsFatal(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_howfar",ig);
00079     EGS_Vector xx(*x,*y,*z), uu(*u,*v,*w);
00080     *inew = egspp_f_geoms[ig]->howfar(*ireg,xx,uu,*ustep,newmed);
00081 }
00082 
00083 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_hownear,EGSPP_HOWNEAR)(
00084         const EGS_I32 *igeom, const EGS_I32 *ireg,
00085         const EGS_Float *x, const EGS_Float *y, const EGS_Float *z,
00086         EGS_Float *tperp) {
00087     int ig = *igeom;
00088     if( ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size() )
00089         egsFatal(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_hownear",ig);
00090     EGS_Vector xx(*x,*y,*z);
00091     *tperp = egspp_f_geoms[ig]->hownear(*ireg,xx);
00092 }
00093 
00094 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_is_where,EGSPP_IS_WHERE)(
00095         const EGS_I32 *igeom,
00096         const EGS_Float *x, const EGS_Float *y, const EGS_Float *z,
00097         EGS_I32 *ireg) {
00098     int ig = *igeom;
00099     if( ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size() )
00100         egsFatal(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_is_where",ig);
00101 
00102     EGS_Vector xx(*x,*y,*z);
00103     *ireg = egspp_f_geoms[ig]->isWhere(xx);
00104 }
00105 
00106 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_n_regions,EGSPP_N_REGIONS)(
00107                 const EGS_I32 *igeom, EGS_I32 *nreg) {
00108     int ig = *igeom;
00109     if( ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size() )
00110         egsFatal(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_n_regions",ig);
00111     *nreg = egspp_f_geoms[ig]->regions();
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_describe_geometry,EGSPP_DESCRIBE_GEOMETRY)(
00116         const EGS_I32 *igeom) {
00117     int ig = *igeom;
00118     if( ig < 0 || ig >= egspp_f_geoms.size() ) {
00119         egsWarning(egspp_f_error_message,"egspp_describe_geometry",ig);
00120         return;
00121     }
00122     egspp_f_geoms[ig]->printInfo();
00123 }
00124 
00125 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_n_media,EGSPP_N_MEDIA)(EGS_I32 *nmed) {
00126     *nmed = EGS_BaseGeometry::nMedia();
00127 }
00128 
00129 extern __extc__ void EGS_EXPORT F77_OBJ_(egspp_get_medium_name,EGSPP_GET_MEDIUM_NAME)(
00130         const EGS_I32 *imed, char *medname, int mlength) {
00131     const static char *vacuum = "VACUUM";
00132     const char *the_medium;
00133     int im = *imed - 1;
00134     if( im >= 0 && im < EGS_BaseGeometry::nMedia() )
00135         the_medium = EGS_BaseGeometry::getMediumName(im);
00136     else the_medium = vacuum;
00137     int n = strlen(the_medium);
00138     if( n > mlength ) n = mlength;
00139     int j;
00140     for(j=0; j<n; ++j) medname[j] = the_medium[j];
00141     for(j=n; j<mlength; ++j) medname[j] = ' ';
00142 }
